item.content:encoded:
[vc_row center_row="" padding_bottom="20px"][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias="slider_2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" column_spacing="40" tablet_fullwidth_cols="yes" bg_style="stretch" el_id="home-content" css=".vc_custom_1476227751392{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Free Updates & Support" heading_type="h2" icon="fa fa-refresh" url_target="_blank" url_rel="nofollow" icon_color="#4a97c2" icon_size="28px" heading_size="16px" url="http://themeforest.net/item/total-responsive-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/6339019?ref=WPExplorer" container_left_padding="50px"]Not only do you get aclean and well coded WordPress theme, but also the support you deserve.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Highly Customizable" heading_type="h2" icon="fa fa-cubes" url_target="_blank" url_rel="nofollow" icon_color="#4a97c2" icon_size="28px" heading_size="16px" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/advanced-theme-panel/" container_left_padding="60px"]Total was developed with child theming in mind, but there are also tons ofbuilt-in optionsfor customizing it.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Drag & Drop Page Builder" heading_type="h2" icon="fa fa-file-text-o" url_target="_blank" url_rel="nofollow" icon_color="#4a97c2" icon_size="28px" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/visual-composer/" container_left_padding="50px" heading_size="16px"]Total comes with an easy drag and drop editor via the Visual Composer making it easy to setup new sites in no time![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1441230431483{margin-bottom: 40px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-top-color: #ededed !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ededed !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vc_column_text]

Top Selling WordPress Theme

Total is our most advanced, best selling and highest rated theme to date. Everything you would expect and more from one of the most popular WordPress related websites out there! [/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="40px"][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/why-choose-total/" title="Why Choose Total" style="flat" align="center" size="small" color="blue" font_weight="400" font_size="16px" icon_right_padding="5px"]Why Choose Total ?[/vcex_button][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_single_image image="4215" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" column_spacing="40" bg_style="stretch"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3695" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Drag & Drop Builder Easily build and save layouts using a drag & drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages, no need to memorize a bunch of shortcodes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="default" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid"][vc_single_image image="3696" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Responsive Design The Total theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device, even on their phones![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3697" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]50+ Builder Blocks Included are 50+ modules to choose from to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" column_spacing="40" bg_style="stretch"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3698" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Advanced Theme Panel A super intuitive and complete theme panel is included so you can change everything including your site colors, container widths, image cropping sizes and much more![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3699" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Custom Post Types The built-in custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add & manage content. Just use builder elements to insert them anywhere.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3700" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Premium Sliders Bundled with this theme are two of the best premium sliders available, LayerSlider & Slider Revolution (a $37 total value for FREE), to create epic sliders for your site.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" column_spacing="40" bg_style="stretch"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3701" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]WooCommerce Support Built-in support for the WooCommerce plugin allows you to sell products on your site. Everything has been designed & extended to fit perfectly with the theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3702" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]SEO Optimized Weve paid close attention to SEO while developing this theme (headings, clean code, speed, etc). Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3703" alignment="left" img_filter="none"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Cross-Browser Compatible With Total you don't have to worry if your site works with a specific browser, we've gone ahead and tested the theme with all major browsers to be sure it looks great![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1441230449234{margin-bottom: 60px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-top-color: #ededed !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ededed !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Best Rated Theme

item.title: Visual Composer
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row bg_style="stretch" parallax_speed="0.5"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]With the Visual Composer and Total you really can create any post or page your want. The Visual Composer is one of CodeCanyon's best selling plugins for a reason - it makes building websites easy. You can build any post or page by using the various elements included with the plugin. With Total, we've taken it a step further and added our own custom page building elements to give you even more website building power. Checkout our video and our Visual Composer guide to learn more.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="50px"][vc_video link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5RwzrlaMBYA"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_cta_button2 h2="Visual Composer Plugin Included Free" style="rounded" txt_align="left" title="Get Started Today" btn_style="rounded" color="blue" size="lg" position="right" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Ftotal-responsive-multipurpose-wordpress-theme%2F6339019%3Fref%3DWPExplorer|title:Total%20WordPress%20theme|target:%20_blank" css_animation="left-to-right"]The Total Theme includes the Visual Composer plugin for free, plus it includes TONS of awesome custom modules created specifically for Total. All with front-end editing support![/vc_cta_button2][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Regarding Buttons

  • You can add buttons on any page via the Visual Composer
  • Choose between many great colors
  • Choose between many different styles
  • Choose between different sizes
  • There are three different button modules - Visual Composer (1 & 2) or Total Buttons

Regarding Pricing Tables

  • Add pricing tables anywhere you want with the Visual Composer
  • Pricing modules can be added into composer rows to create 1,2,3,4 column layouts
  • Define a "Featured" pricing or don't define any at all
  • Alter the colors for any pricing table
  • Add a button with a url or a custom button such as paypal
  • Add icons to the standard buttons
  • Enter your pricing features via a WYSIWYG editor!

RegardingCarousels

  • The theme includes image, staff, portfolio, blog and WooCommerce carousel options
  • You can have as many as you want on a page (but less is always better for loading times)
  • The Carousels will actually render in the Visual Composer front-end editor for easy editing
  • You can choose between default or no-margins style
  • You can enable the title or description for staff, portfolio, blog and WooCommerce carousels
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Add image or post type carousels anywhere

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: demoswpex
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="45px" bg_color="#f6f6f6" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="0px 0px 1px 0px" padding_top="45px"][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Spend less time coding & more time building

Total comes with the Visual Composer plugin built-in so you can easily create your pages using drag and drop right in your post editor. You don't have to be a web designer to create epic and unique layouts![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3143" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="full" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="90px" padding_top="70px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_single_image image="3144" css_animation="left-to-right" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Responsive, Mobile-Friendy Design

These days it is more important then ever to provided your users with a website that they can use not only at home but also on the go. That's why the Total WordPress theme is fully responsive and mobile friend. Resize the browser so you can see the responsiveness in action![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="75px" padding_top="65px" bg_color="#f6f6f6" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="1px 0px 1px 0px"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Powerful Admin Panel

The Total WordPress theme makes use of the new Redux Framework for all of it's theme options. Not only is it a very powerful options panel it's also fast, well coded, translatable and most importantly well supported. Quickly and easily customize various parts of your site such as colors, layout, header, image cropping sizes and sooo much more![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3146" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" bg_color="#4a97c2" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="1px 0px 1px 0px" padding_bottom="75px" style="light" padding_top="70px"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_spacing size="7px"][vc_video link="http://vimeo.com/64482230"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Create Your Layout

When it comes to your site you should have control over the layout. The Total WordPress theme includes options for boxed or full-width layouts as well as there are built-in options to control the widths of your content so even though the default content width for the desktop is 980px you can make it whatever you want! There are also built-in options to control the widths of your site at the different responsive sizes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" bg_color="#f6f6f6" border_color="#e8e8e8" border_width="1px 0px 1px 0px" padding_bottom="45px" padding_top="45px"][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Elite Author

When you have the choice why go with a new author? Choose an Elite! We've been selling themes for years and over that time we've learned exactly what it is you are looking for and need for your site, so we provide it! From a strong, well coded framework to great support.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3147" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="full" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" border_style="solid" padding_bottom="45px" padding_top="50px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="2883" css_animation="left-to-right" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]

Strong, Well-Coded Framework

We've spent a long time building this theme and making sure every aspect is well coded and clean so if you are a developer you can easily tweak your theme to better suit your needs. All the code is commented out so you know exactly what the PHP is there for (in plain English) and there are various filters and "overwritable" functions making child-theming a dream come true![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/64482230" width="500" height="281" frameborder="0" title="Visual Composer 3.5: Building Complex Layout in Action" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

color="#dd3333" css=".vc_custom_1441749464358{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;border-top-color: #ededed !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ededed !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Regarding Headings

The built-in custom Heading module in Total for the Visual Composer includes a fewstyles (plain, bottom border color and graphical) but they have a custom CSS tab you can use to design them however you want!
  • You can choose between h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,span,div
  • You can add as many as you want to a page
  • You can easily alter the font size, color and font family
  • You can add a link and hover color to the heading
  • And much more!
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: demoswpex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_heading text="Custom Login Form" color="#444444"][vcex_spacing size="15px"][vc_column_text]Easily insert a login form on any page of your sitevia the visual Composer page builder to allow people to log into your WordPress site. You can use a plugin to redirect people to your custom login page. This can also be good for security reasons.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_login_form remember="false" lost_password="false" register="false"]You are currently logged in[/vcex_login_form][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Advanced Theme Customizer
item.dc:creator: demoswpex
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Total uses a custom extended version of the WordPress Theme Customizer to give you lots of easy to use options for your website. Simply navigate to your WordPress Dashboard, and under Appearance click on the Customizeitem. Some of the many options include custom logo upload, header style, custom typography, custom image cropping, built-in social sharing and more. Have a look at the screenshots below to see what else Total can do.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Easy To Use Options

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Built-in Color Pickers

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]

Includes Custom Post Type Styling

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Total has the most advanced theme panel out there

item.title: Advanced Page Settings
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Total includes great options for each and every page you add to our site. When adding a new page, you'll see a Page Settings module just below the main content and/or Visual Composer section. From here you can individually select options on a per page basis for your page layout, custom sidebar, social sharing, enable/disable the header, enable/disable the footer, add a custom footer callout, add a subheading, includea header slider (just paste in your Layer Slider shortcode into this field) and select a title style. Check it out![/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_single_image image="3980" alignment="center" img_link_large="yes" img_size="full" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Homepage 2
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row center_row="yes" margin_top="45px" margin_bottom="25px"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Welcome to Total

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus lobortis mauris orci, vel elementum massa posuere nec. Etiam consectetur nunc id enim ultrices, ultrices luctus ipsum blandit. Phasellus sit amet augue tellus. Nulla facilisi. Pellentesque elementum est augue, non blandit erat ullamcorper id. Suspendisse iaculis hendrerit condimentum. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_color="#f5f5f5" padding_top="55px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Custom Builder Blocks" heading_type="h2" icon="cubes" icon_size="42px"]

The Visual Composer is a great plugin, but combined with the Total theme it is out of this world! We've extended the builder to bring you many unique and highly customizable modules.

[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Efficient & Clean Code" heading_type="h2" icon="code" icon_size="42px"]

We take pride in coding quality themes, we don't "steal" any code or take any shortcuts. We also keep our themes updated constantly to ensure everything is as well optimized as it can be.

Create unlimited layouts for your posts & pages, no need to memorize shortcodes.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="laptop" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Responsive Design" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="star" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="50+ Builder Blocks" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]Included are 50+ modules to choose from to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" parallax_mobile="" video_bg="" padding_bottom="15px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="cogs" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Advanced Theme Panel" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]A super intuitive and complete theme panel is included so you can change everything including your site colors, container widths, image cropping sizes and much more![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="globe" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Translation Ready" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]The included .PO and .MO files, translatable theme panel (via WPML) and custom functions make it easy to use Total in your native language and/or multiple languages.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="WooCommerce Support" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self" icon="shopping-cart"]Built-in support for the WooCommerce plugin will allow you to sell products on your site with ease. Everything has been designed & extended to fit perfectly with the theme.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" parallax_mobile="" video_bg=""][vc_column width="1/1"][vcex_portfolio_grid term_slug="all" grid_style="no_margins" filter="false" columns="4" posts_per_page="8" img_width="500" img_height="350" img_crop="true" img_filter="none" thumb_link="post" order="DESC" orderby="date" pagination="false" title="false" excerpt="false" read_more="false" excerpt_length="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" parallax_mobile="" video_bg="" padding_top="20px"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="search" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="SEO Optimized" heading_type="h2" url_target="_self" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400"]We've paid close attention to SEO while developing this theme (headings, clean code, speed, etc). Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="columns" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Boxed or Full-Width Layout" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout for your website design. There is no need to dig into the stylesheet or change the grid system to get the layout you need.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon="picture-o" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading="Custom Post Types" heading_type="h2" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px" heading_weight="400" url_target="_self"]Built-in custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add and manage your content. item.title: Why Choose Total?
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Drag & Drop Builder" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3890" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Easily build and save layouts using a drag & drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts or pages with just a few clicks.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Responsive Design" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3891" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Total is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="50+ Builder Blocks" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3900" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Included are 50+ modules to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="FontAwesome Icons" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3906" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Total comes with support for FontAwesome icons, so you can add 470+ infinitely scalable icons to any post or page![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Boxed & Full-Width Layouts" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3899" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout for your website design. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Custom Post Types" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3902" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add & manage content. plus you can custom name each type![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Unlimited Theme" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3897" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Youll love the endless possibilities with Total. Unlimited portfolios, color options, staff, testimonials, blogs, page layouts and more![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Translation Ready" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3896" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]The included .PO and .MO files & translatable theme panel make it easy to use Total in your language or multiple languages.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Child Theme Ready" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3893" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Weve paid close attention to all the functions used in Total to make sure they can be easily extended via child themes.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="WooCommerce Support" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3898" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Built-in WooCommerce support allows you to sell products on your site. This is a great way to make some money with your website.[/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="CSS3 Standards" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3894" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]This theme has been coded with the latest CSS3 code. Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="SEO Optimized" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3895" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]We used only semantic valid HTML code and proper heading tags when developing Total. Plus the theme is W3C valid![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="Power Elite Author" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3903" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]Total was created by an Envato Power Elite author, with over $1 million in sales, so you know you're getting a fantastic theme![/vcex_feature_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_feature_box style="left-image-right-content" heading="You Know & Love Us" content_width="60%" media_width="40%" phone_widths="fullwidth" image="3904" img_width="9999" img_height="9999" background="#f7f7f7" padding="20px 20px 20px 20px" border="1px solid #e4e4e4" heading_margin="0 0 10px"]WPExplorer is one of the most trusted names in WordPress. item.title: Testimonial Slider
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vcex_testimonials_slider display_author_name="no" height_animation="400" animation_speed="600" slideshow_speed="5000" count="3" order="DESC" orderby="date" background_style="stretch" img_width="70px" img_height="70px"][vcex_divider icon_color="#000000" icon_size="14px" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="40px" width="100%" height="1px"][vc_column_text]

Regarding The Testimonial Slider

  • You can have unlimited testimonial sliders
  • Automatically displays testimonials from the custom post type
  • Choose to display recent or random testimonials
  • Display or hide the testimonial avatars
  • Choose testimonials from specific categories
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Toggle Bar
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Welcome Say hello to the toggle bar. This is an optional section you can use to display any content you'd like. Simply select a page from the theme panel and the content of the page will display here. You can even use the drag and drop builder to create this! This is a perfect place for your company mission statement, alerts, notices or anything else.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_column_text]Get In Touch[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vcex_list_item icon="envelope" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" text_align="textleft" url_target="self"]Email: support@total.com[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item icon="phone-square" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" text_align="textleft" url_target="self"]Phone: 1-800-Total-Theme[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item icon="map-marker" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" text_align="textleft" url_target="self"]Address: Las Vegas, Nevada[/vcex_list_item][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Our Location[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="30px"][vc_single_image image="3660" border_color="grey" alignment="none" img_filter="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

We provide you with a clean and well coded theme plus the support you deserve.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#3b86b0" icon_size="24px" heading="Highly Customizable" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" icon="star" heading_size="16px" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/advanced-theme-panel/" url_rel="nofollow"]Total was developed with child theming in mind, but there are also tons ofbuilt-in optionsfor customizing it.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="one" icon_color="#3b86b0" icon_size="24px" heading="Drag & Drop" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" icon="bars" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/visual-composer/" url_rel="nofollow"]Total comes with an easy drag and drop editor via the Visual Composermaking it easy to setup new sites in no time![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid" padding_top="35px" bg_color="#f5f5f5" border_color="#ededed" border_width="1px 0 1px 0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

item.title: Advanced Grid Builder
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]In Total 2.0.0 we added support for the new Visual Composer Post Grid builder so you can easily create all sorts of custom grids for your site for your various post types. Have a look at the video below for an example of how you can easily create beautiful standard or masonry grids with image hovers, jQuery filters, load more buttons and more! All using the drag&drop Visual Composer page builder.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="" visibility="" css_animation="" style="" column_spacing="" center_row="" no_margins="" tablet_fullwidth_cols="" bg_style="" parallax_style="" parallax_direction="" parallax_mobile="" video_bg="" video_bg_overlay="" border_style=""][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_video link="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bptpBrKW_sM"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_video link="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6bhdjm69yAU"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/92033601" width="980" height="551" frameborder="0" title="Create your own webpage in less then 10 minutes with Visual Composer page builder for WordPress" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

item.title: Custom Footer Builder
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: Don't get stuck with a boring footer composed of widgets. Total includes an advanced Footer builder function that allows you to create your own footer design via the drag and drop Visual Composer - yay! All you have to do is create a new page, design your footer using the Visual Composer and then select it from a dropdown in the "Footer Builder" admin panel. With all the awesome Visual Composer modules, creating the site footer that best fits your needs is a breeze. Plus, if you enable the footer builder all other footer functions (such as the footer widget areas and footer customizer settings) are disabled to keep your site fast and well optimized.

item.title: Under Construction Add-On
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: Total includes a built-in "Under Construction" add-on which you can use to redirect any "non-logged-in" users to your page of choice. This will allow you to create a cool "coming soon" or "under construction" page using the Visual Composer page builder without having to install 3rd party plugins that may or may not work and don't allow you to take advantage of all the awesome building blocks.
